name: Slime Detective in The Case of The Dead Green Cube
name_original: Slime Detective in The Case of The Dead Green Cube
description:
Deep is space drifts the Rhombus IX.  The pinnacle of space transportation.  Sadly, there has been a murder.  Green the lovable comms specialist was found dead in the cargo bay.  No one has boarded or left the ship since.  Meaning one of the crewmates killed Green.  As the galaxy’s best detective, you have been called in to solve this case and bring the murder to justice.  Can you catch the killer?

 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Z/X ------------------Progress the story

 

==================================================

Credits:

Developer : Digx7
